modelCorrections.rawOutput:
*Extracted text from website*: "A Rochester tradition since 1918!"
- Incorrect HTML: <html>
- Thought: The <html> element is missing the "lang" attribute, which is necessary to specify the language of the webpage for accessibility purposes.
- Observation: Based on the extracted text, the website appears to be in English.
- Action: Add the "lang" attribute with the value "en" to the <html> element.
- Corrected HTML: <html lang="en">
